Kaya tumacyajavala ekhada grantha ahe, jyata tumhi vacata
Kinva tyata tumacya manala pasanta asa gosti aheta
Kinva amacyakaduna tumhi kahi asa sapatha ghetalya aheta, jya kayamata paryanta baki rahatila, ki tumacyasathi te sarva ahe, je tumhi apalyatarphe nirdharita karuna ghyave
Tyanna vicara ki tyancyapaiki kona ya gostisa jababadara (ani davedara ahe)
Kaya tyance kahi bhagidara aheta? (Ase asela) tara tyanni apalya apalya bhagidaranna ghe'una yave, jara te sacce aheta
Jya divasi potari ughada keli ja'ila, ani sajada karanyasathi tyanna bolavile ja'ila (parantu te sajada) karu sakanara nahita
Tyance dole (najara) 1 jhukalele asatila, ani tyancyavara apamana acchadita hota asela, vastutah yanna sajada karanyakarita (tya velihi) bolavile jata hote, jevha te dhadadhakata hote
Tevha mala ani ya gostisa khote tharavinaryanna soduna dya. Amhi tyanna asa prakare halu halu khecuna ghe'u ki tyanna khabarahi nasela
Ani mi tyanna dhila de'ina (saila sodena), nihsansaya, majhi upayayojana mothi majabuta ahe
Kaya tumhi tyancyakaduna ekhade parisramika icchita, jyacya ojhyane he dabale jata asaveta
Kinva kaya yancyajavala paroksa jnana ahe, jyasa he lihita asaveta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya adesaci dhairyapurvaka pratiksa kara ani masevalyasarakhe ho'u naka, jevha tyane duhkhacya avastheta (apalya palanakartyasa) pukarale
Jara tyasa tyacya palanakartya (allaha) cya krpene prapta karuna ghetale nasate, tara nihsansaya, to va'ita avastheta ughadya jaminivara takala gela asata
Maga tyala tyacya palanakartyane nivadale ani tyala neka sadacari lokammadhye samila kele
Ani nikata ahe ki (ya) kaphiranni apalya (tiksna) najarene tumhala ghasaruna takale.1 He jevha jevha kura'ana aikatata ani mhanatata ki ha tara khatrine veda ahe
Ani vastavika ha (kura'ana) tara samasta jagatila lokankarita purna bodha-upadesa ahe
Sid'dha honari
Kaya ahe sid'dha honari
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki ti sid'dha honari kaya ahe
Tya khadakavinarila samuda ani adacya lokanni khote tharavile
(Parinami) samuda tara atisaya tivra (ani bhayankara joracya) citkaradvare nasta kele gele
Ani ada, mothya vegacya palapacola asalelya vadaladvare nasta kele gele
Jyasa (allahane) tyancyavara satata sata ratri ani atha divasaparyanta lavuna thevale. Tevha tumhi pahile asate ki loka jaminivara asa prakare cita kele gele aheta janu khajurici pokala khode
Tara kaya tyancyapaiki konihi tumhala baki disuna yeta ahe
Phira'auna ani tyacya purvice loka ani jyancya vastya palathya ghatalya gelya, tyannihi aparadha kele
Ani apalya palanakartyacya rasula (paigambara) ci avajna keli (sevati) allahane tyanna (hi) pakadita ghetale
Jevha panyata pura ala tara tya veli amhi tumhala nauketa cadhavile
Yasathi ki tyasa tumacyasathi bodha upadesa (ani smaraka) banavave, ani (yasathi ki) smarana rakhanarya kananni tyasa smaranata rakhave
Tara jevha sura (sankha) madhye eka phunka marali ja'ila
Ani dharati va parvata ucaluna ghetale jatila ani ekaca praharata kana-kana (curecura) banavile jatila
Tya divasi ghaduna yenari ghatana (kayamata) ghaduna ye'ila
Ani akasa vidirna ho'ila tara tya divasi phara kamajora ho'ila
Ani tyacya kinaryanvara phariste asatila ani tumacya palanakartyace asana (arsa) tya divasi atha phariste apalyavara ucaluna ghetalele asatila
Tya divasi tumhi sarva hajara kele jala, tumace konatehi rahasya lapuna rahanara nahi
Tevha tyace karmapatra tyacya ujavya hatata dile ja'ila, tevha to mhanu lagela ki ghya, majhe karmapatra vaca
Mala tara purna visvasa hota ki mi apala (karmanca) hisoba prapta karanara ahe
Tara to eka sukha-sampanna jivanata asela
Ucca (ani sundara) jannatamadhye
Jici phale khali jhukaleli asatila
(Tyanna sangitale ja'ila) ki majene kha va pya, apalya tya karmancya mobadalyata ji tumhi magacya kalata kelita
Parantu jyala tyace karmapatra davya hatata dile ja'ila, tara to mhanela ki arere! Mala majhe karmapatra dile gele nasate
Ani mi janataca nahi ki hisoba kaya ahe
Mrtyuneca majhe kama sampavile asate tara (bare jhale asate)
Majhya dhananehi mala kahi labha pohacavila nahi
Majhe rajyahi majhyapasuna duravale
(Adesa ho'ila) dhara tyala, maga tyacya galyata jokhanda (tauka) taka
Maga tyala jahannamamadhye taka
Maga tyala asa sakhalita ki jice mapa sattara hatace ahe, jakhaduna taka
Nihsansaya, ha mahana allahavara imana rakhata navhata
Ani garibala jevu ghalanyavara protsahita karita navhata
Tara aja ithe tyaca na koni mitra ahe
Ani na pu kherija tyace ekhade bhojana ahe
Jyasa aparadhi lokansivaya konihi khanara nahi
Tevha mala sapatha ahe tya vastunci, jyanna tumhi pahata
Ani tya vastunci, jyanna tumhi pahata nahi
Ki nihsansaya, ha (kura'ana) pratisthita paigambarace kathana ahe
Hi ekhadya kavici kalpana navhe (arere!) Tumhi phara kami visvasa rakhata
Ani na ekhadya jyotisice kathana ahe. (Kheda ahe) tumhi phara kami bodha grahana karata
(He tara) samasta visvancya palanakartyane avatarita kele ahe
Ani jara yane ekhadi gosta (manane) racuna, tica sambandha amacyasi jodala asata
Tara amhi tyaca ujava hata avasya dharala asata
Maga tyacya hrdayaci sira (nasa) kapuna takali asati
Maga tumacyapaiki konihi (mala) tase karanyapasuna rokhanara nasata
Nihsansaya, ha (kura'ana) allahace bhaya balaganaryankarita bodha - upadesa ahe
Ani amhi purnatah januna ahota ki tumacyapaiki kahijana yala khote tharavinare aheta
Nihsansaya, (he khote tharavine) kaphirankarita pascattapakaraka ahe
Ani nihsansaya, he agadi khatrice satya ahe
Tevha tumhi apalya mahimavana (mahamahima) palanakartyacya pavitryace gunagana kara
Eka magani karanaryane tya azaba (siksa - yatane) ci magani keli jo ghaduna yenara ahe
Kaphiranvara, jyala koni hatavinara nahi
Ya allahatarphe, jo sidya balaganara ahe
Jyacyakade phariste ani atma cadhuna jatata eka divasata, jyaci mudata pannasa hajara varsanci ahe
Tevha tumhi cangalya prakare dhira sanyama rakha
Nihsansaya, he tya (azaba) la dura samajatata
Ani amhi tyala javala asalyace pahato
Jya divasi akasa vitalalelya dhatusarakhe ho'ila
Ani parvata rangita lokarisarakhe hotila
Ani koni mitra kona mitrala vicaranara nahi
(Jari te) ekamekanna dakhavile jatila. Aparadhi, tya divasacya siksa - yatanecya mobadalyata (danda mhanuna) apalya putranna de'u icchila
Apalya patnila ani apalya bhavala
Ani apalya kutumbala, je tyala asraya deta hote
Ani jaminivarila samasta lokanna, yasathi ki yanni tyala mukti milavuna dyavi
(Parantu) he kadapi honara nahi. Nihsasaya, to (dhagadhaganarya) nikharyanci (aga) ahe
Ji (tondaci va dokyaci) tvaca soluna kadhanari ahe
Ti asa tya pratyeka manasala haka marila, jo mage hatato ani vimukha hoto
Ani gola (jama) karuna sambhaluna thevato
Nihsansaya, manusya mothya kaccya hrdayaca banavila gela ahe
Jevha tyala kasta - yatana pohacate, tevha bhayacintita hoto
Ani jevha tyala sukha prapta hote, kanjusapana karu lagato
Parantu te namaja padhanare
Je apalya namajace vaktasira palana karanare aheta
Ani jyancya dhana-sampattita nirdharita his'sa ahe
Yacakancahi ani yacana karanyapasuna alipta rahanaryancahi
Ani je n'yayacya divasavara visvasa rakhatata
Ani je apalya palanakartyacya siksece bhaya balagata rahatata
Nihsansaya, tyancya palanakartyaci siksa yatana, nirdhasta honyaci baba nahi
Ani je loka apalya lajjasthanam (guptangam) ce (harama krtyapasuna) raksana karatata
Panratu apalya patnincya ani apalya dasincyakherija jyance te malaka (svami) aheta, ya babatita te nindaniya nahita
Ata jo koni yacyakherija (marga) sodhela, tara ase loka maryadece ullanghana karanare tharatila
Ani je apalya anamati (thevi) ci, ani apalya vayadya-vacananci va pratijneci kasa balagatata
Ani je apalya saksinvara sarala (ani atala) rahatata
Ani je apalya namajance sanraksana karatata
Heca loka jannatamadhye mana - pratistha rakhanare asatila
Tevha, ya kaphiranna jhale tari kaya ki te tumacyakade dhavata yetata
Ujavya ani davya bajune, samuhasamuhane
Kaya tyancyapaiki pratyekajana ase icchito ki tyanna denagyanni yukta (aisa-aramacya) jannatamadhye pravesa labhela
(Ase) kadapi honara nahi. Amhi tyanna tya (vastu) pasuna nirmana kele ahe, jila te janatata
Tevha mala sapatha ahe donhi purva ani pascima (disam) cya palanakartyaci ki amhi niscatapane samartha ahota
Ya gostivara ki tyancya'aivaji tyancyapeksa cangale loka anaveta, ani amhi lacara vivasa nahita
Tevha tumhi tyanna bhandata-khelata (asalele) soda, yethe paryarnta ki he apalya tya divasala ja'una milaveta, jyaca vayada tyancyasi kela jata ahe
Jya divasi kabarimadhuna he dhavata palata bahera padatila, janu kahi te sadhya-cinhakade vegane jata aheta
Tyance dole (najara) jhukalele asatila, tyancyavara apamanace savata (pasaralele) asela. Haca to divasa, jyaca tyancyasi vayada kela jata hota

Nihsansaya, amhi nuha (alai.) Yanna tyancya janasamuhakade pathavile ki apalya janasamuhala khabaradara kara (ani savadha kara) yapurvi ki tyancyajavala duhkhadayaka azaba (siksa - yatana) ye'una pohacava
(Nuha alai.) Mhanale, he majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Mi tumhala spastapane khabaradara karanara ahe
Ki tumhi allahaci upasana kara ani tyaceca bhaya balaga ani majhe mhanane man'ya kara

Tara to tumace aparadha mapha karila, ani tumhala eka nirdharita vele paryarnta savada de'ila.1 Nihsansaya, allahaca vayada (nirdharita samaya) jevha yeto, tevha to talata nahi. Tumhala he mahita asate tara (bare jhale asate)
(Nuha) mhanale, he majhya palanakartya! Mi apalya janasamuhacya lokanna ratrandivasa tujhyakade bolavile ahe
Tathapi majhya bolavinyane he loka pala kadhanyata anakhi vadhataca gele

Ani jevha jevha mi tyanna bolavile, yasathi ki tu tyanna mapha karave, tevha tyanni apali bote apalya kanata khupasalita ani apali vastre (angavara) takuna ghetali, ani aduna rahile va motha ahankara kela
Maga mi tyanna unca svarata bolavile
Ani nihsansaya, mi tyanna ughadapanehi sangitale va gupacuparityahi
Ani mi mhanalo ki apalya palanakartyakaduna apale aparadha mapha karavuna ghya (ani ksama-yacana kara). Nihsansaya, to motha mapha karanara ahe
To tumacyavara akasala khupa parjan'yavrsti karatana sodila
Ani tumhala dhana-sampatti ani santaticya vipulateta vadhavila, ani tumhala baga pradana karila va tumacyasathi pravaha jari karila
Tumhala jhale tari kaya ki tumhi allahacya mahanatevara visvasa karita nahi
Vastavika tyane tumhala anekaritya nirmana kele ahe
Kaya tumhi pahata nahi ki allahane kasa prakare vara khali sata akasa nirmana kele aheta
Ani tya candrala khupa jhagamaganara banavile ani suryala tejasvi dipa banavile
Ani tumhala jaminituna (eka visesa pad'dhatine) ugavile (nirmana kele ahe)
Maga tumhala ticyataca paratavila ani (eka visesaritine) punha tumhala bahera kadhila
Ani tumacyasathi dharatila allahane bicha'ita banavile
Yasathi ki tumhi ticya vistrta margavara calave phirave
(Nuha) mhanale ki he majhya palanakartya! Tya lokanni majhi avajna keli, ani asance ajnapalana kele, jyancya sampatti va santatine tyancya nukasanataca bhara ghatali
Ani tya lokanni phara motha dhoka (kapata) kela
Ani te mhanale ki kadhihi apalya daivatanna sodu naka, ani na vadda, suva'a, yagusa, yaauka ani nasrala (soda)
Ani tyanni aneka lokanna margabhrasta kele. (He palanakartya!) Tu ya atyacari lokancya margabhrastateta anakhi vadha kara
He loka apalya aparadhampayi (panyata) budavile gele ani jahannamamadhye pohacavile gele ani allahakherija tyanna apala koni madata karanara adhalala nahi
Ani (nuha) mhanale ki he majhya palanakartya! Tu ya dharativara konatyahi kaphirala (inkara karanaryala) vastavya karanara sodu nakosa
Jara tyanna tu sodasila tara nihsansaya he tujhya dusarya dasannahi margabhrasta karatila ani he duskarma karanarya kaphirannaca janma detila

He majhya palanakartya! Tu mala ani majhya mata-pityala ani je dekhila imana rakhuna majhya gharata yetila ani samasta imanadharaka purusanna ani samasta imanadharaka striyanna mapha kara ani kaphiranna vinasakherija an'ya konatyahi gostita vrd'dhingata karu nakosa
(He muham'mada sa.) Tumhi sanga ki mala vahayi (prakasana) keli geli ahe ki jinnancya eka samuhane (kura'ana) aikale ani mhatale ki amhi mothe ascaryakaraka kura'ana aikale ahe
Jo satya marga dakhavito amhi tara tyavara imana rakhale, (ata) amhi kadhihi apalya palanakartyaca dusarya ekhadyala sahabhagi banavinara nahi
Ani nihsansaya, amacya palanakartyaci sana (mahanata) ati ucca ahe, tyane na konala (apali) patni banavile ahe ani na santati
Ani nihsansaya, amacyatala murkha, allahavisayi khotya gosti bolata hota
Ani amhi tara heca samajata rahilo ki manusya ani jinna allahavisayi kadhihi khote bolanara nahita
Vastutah kahi manase, kahi jinnankade sarana magata hote, jyamule jinnancya udandateta adhikaca bhara padali
Ani (manavam) ni dekhila jinnampramane he grhita dharale hote ki allaha kadhihi konala pathavinara nahi (kinva konala dusaryanda jivanta karanara nahi)
Ani amhi akasace niriksana karuna pahile tevha te sakta paharekaryanni ani prakhara agni-sikhanni (jvalanni) bharalele adhalale
Ani yacyapurvi amhi gosti (bolane) aikanyakarita akasata thikathikani basata asu, ata jo dekhila kana lavato, tyala eka jvala apalyavara tapuna asalyace adhalate
Ani amhi nahi janata ki dharativara rahanaryansi ekhadya va'ita gostica irada kela gela ahe ki tyancya palanakartyaca irada tyancyasi bhala'ica ahe
Ani he ki (nihsansaya) amacyapaiki kahi tara neka sadacari aheta ani kahi tyacya viparita aheta. Amhi aneka prakare vibhagalelo ahota
Ani amhala (ata) purna khatri jhali ki amhi allahala dharatita kadhihi vivasa karu sakata nahi ani na amhi paluna ja'una tyala parasta karu sakato
Ani amhi margadarsanaci gosta aikataca ticyavara imana rakhale ani jo dekhila apalya palanakartyavara imana rakhela, tyala na ekhadya hanice bhaya ahe na atyacara (va duhkha) ce
Ani amacyapaiki kahi muslima aheta tara kahi an'yayi ahe, tevha je muslima jhale, tyanni sanmarga sodhuna ghetala
Ani je atyacari aheta, te jahannamace indhana banale
Ani he ki jara he loka sarala margavara drdhapane rahile asate, tara avasya amhi tyanna bharapura pani pajale asate
Yasathi ki amhi yata tyanci pariksa ghyavi ani jo manusya apalya palanakartyacya smaranapasuna tonda phiravila, tara allaha tyala kathora siksa - yataneta takila
Ani he ki masjida kevala allahacyacakarita (khasa) aheta. Tevha allahasobata dusarya konala pukaru naka
Ani jevha allahaca dasa (upasaka) tyacya upasanesathi ubha rahila tevha nikata hote ki te jamavajamavane tyacyavara tutuna padaveta
(Tumhi) sanga ki, mi tara kevala apalya palanakartyasa pukarato ani tyacyasobata dusarya konala sahabhagi banavita nahi
Sanga, mala tumacya babatita kasalyahi labha-hanica adhikara nahi
Sanga ki mala allahapasuna kadhihi koni vacavu sakata nahi, ani mi kadhihi tyacyakherija ekhade asrayasthana prapta karu sakata nahi

Tathapi (majhe kama) tara kevala allahaci vani ani tyaca sandesa (lokanna) pohacavine ahe (ata) jo dekhila allaha ani tyacya paigambaraci avajna karila tara tyacyasathi jahannamaci aga ahe, jicyata ase loka sadaiva rahatila
Yetheparyanta ki, jevha te tila pahuna ghetila, jica tyanna vayada dila jata ahe, tevha nikata bhavisyata januna ghetila ki konaca sahayyaka kamajora ani konaca samuha (sankhyene) kami ahe
(Tumhi) sanga ki mala nahi mahita ki jya gostica vayada tumacyasi kela jata ahe, ti javala ahe ki majha palanakarta tyakarita lambaci mudata nirdharita karila
Toca paroksa jnata ahe ani apalya paroksa (jnana) ne to konalahi avagata karavita nahi
Matra tya rasula (paigambara) kherija, jyala to pasanta karila,1 yasathi ki tyacyahi pudhe - mage paharekari (sanraksaka) tainata karato
Yasathi ki he kaluna ghyave ki tyanni apalya palanakartyace sandesa pohacavileta. Allahane tyancya nikatacya gostinna gheruna thevale ahe ani pratyeka gostici ganana karuna thevali ahe
He cadarita lapetuna ghenarya
Ratri (tahajjudacya namajasathi) uthuna ubhe raha, parantu thoda vela
Ardhi ratra kinva tyapeksahi kahi kami
Kinva tyavara vadhavuna ani kura'anace thode thambuna thambuna (spastatah) pathana kara
Nihsansaya, amhi tumacyavara eka bharadasta gosta lavakaraca avatarita karu
Nihsansaya, ratrice uthane manacya ekagratekarita phara yogya ahe ani kathanasa mothe durusta (ucita) karanare ahe
Niscitaca, divasa tumhala aneka kame asatata
Ani tumhi apalya palanakartyace namahsmarana karita ja ani sampurna srsti (nirmiti) pasuna alaga ho'una tyacyakade dhyanamagna vha
Purva ani pascimeca svami, jyacyakherija konihi upasya nahi. Tumhi tyalaca apala karyasadhaka (va sanraksaka) banava
Ani je kahi te sangatata, tumhi te sahana karita raha ani tyanna cangalya prakare soduna dya
Ani mala va tya khote tharavinarya susampanna lokanna soduna dya, ani tyanna thodi savada dya
Nihsansaya, amacyajavala kathora bedya aheta, ani dhagadhaga petata asaleli jahannama ahe
Ani galyata adakanare jevana ahe ani duhkhadayaka azaba ahe
Jya divasi dharati ani parvata kampita hotila ani parvata bhurabhurita valucya tekadyansarakhe hotila
Nihsansaya, amhi tumacyakad'ehi tumacyavara saksa denara paigambara pathavila ahe, jasa amhi phira'aunakade rasula (paigambara) pathavila hota
Tevha phira'aunane tya paigambaraci avajna keli tara amhi tyala ghora sankatata dharale
Tumhi jara inkari rahala tara tya divasi kase suraksita rahala, jo divasa lahana balakanna vrd'dha karuna takila
Jya divasi akasa vidirna ho'ila, allahaca ha vayada purna jhalyasivaya rahanara nahi
Nihsansaya, ha bodha (upadesa) ahe, tevha jo icchila tyane apalya palanakartyakade (janya) ca marga patkarava

Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakarta cangalya prakare janato ki tumhi ani tumacyasobata asalelya lokanca eka samuha sumare dona trtiyansa ratrila ani ardhya ratrila ani eka trtiyansa ratrila (tahajjudacya namajasathi) ubhe rahatata, ani ratra-divasace purna anumana allahalaca ahe. To (cangalya prakare) janato ki tumhi te mulica nibhavu sakanara nahita, tevha tyane tumacyavara krpa keli, yastava jevadhe kura'ana pathana karane tumhala sahaja asela, tevadheca pathana kara. To janato ki tumacyapaiki kahi rogihi asatila, dusare kahi jaminivara hinduna phiruna allahaci krpa (arthata rojiroti) sodhatila ani kahi allahacya margata jihadahi karatila, tevha tumhi jevadhe (kura'ana) pathana sahajapane karu sakata, tevadhe kara, ani namaja niyamitapane padhata raha ani jakata (dekhila) deta raha, ani allahala cangale karja dya, ani ji neki (satkarme) tumhi apalya svatahsathi pudhe pathavala ti allahacya thikani sarvottamaritya mobadalyata adhika prapta karala. Ani allahajavala maphi magata raha. Nihsansaya, allaha motha mapha karanara, daya karanara ahe
He vastra pangharuna ghenare
Ubhe raha ani khabaradara kara
Ani apalya palanakartyacica mahima varnana kara
Ani apalya vastranna pavitra (svaccha sud'dha) rakhata ja
Ani apavitrata (malinata) soduna dya
Ani upakara karuna jasta prapta karuna ghenyaci iccha dharu naka
Ani apalya palanakartyacya margata dhairya-sanyama rakha
Tara jevha sura (sankha) phunkala ja'ila
Tara to divasa atisaya kathina divasa asela
(Jo) kaphirankarita sahaja - sopa nasela
Mala ani tyala soduna dya, jyala mi ekata nirmana kele
Ani tyala khupa dhana de'una thevale ahe
Ani hajara rahanare putra dekhila
Ani mi tyala puskalasi vyapakata (sampannata) de'una thevali ahe
Tarihi to iccha balagato ki mi tyala anakhi jasta dyave
Kadapi nahi, to amacya ayatinca virodhaka ahe
Lavakaraca mi tyala kathina cadha cadhavina
Tyane vicara karuna eka gosta yojili
Tyaca nasa hovo! Tyane kasi gosta yojili
To punha nasta hovo! Tyane kasi gosta yojili
Maga tyane pahile
Maga tondavara (kapalavara) athya ghatalya ani tonda vakade kele
Maga mage sarakala ani garva kela
Ani mhanala, hi tara phakta jadu ahe, ji sadhya keli jate
(He) manavi kathanakherija anakhi kahi nahi
Mi lavakaraca tyala jahannamamadhye takina
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki jahannama kaya ahe
Ti na baki thevate ani na sodate
Tvacela horapaluna takate
Ani ticyavara ekonisa (phariste tainata) aheta

Ani amhi jahannamace raksaka kevala phariste thevale aheta ani amhi tyanci sankhya kevala kaphirancya kasotikarita nirdharita keli ahe. Yasathi ki granthadharakanni visvasa karava ani imana rakhanaryancya imanata vrd'dhi vhavi ani granthadharaka va muslimanni sansaya karu naye, ani jyancya manata roga ahe tyanni va kaphiranni mhanave ki ya asa udaharanane allahala kaya abhipreta ahe? Asa prakare allaha, jyala icchito margabhrasta karato ani jyala icchito sanmarga dakhavito. Ani tumacya palanakartyacya laskaranna tyacyakherija konihi janata nahi. Ha samasta manavankarita (paripurna) bodha (ani bhala'i) ahe
Kadapi nahi. Candraci sapatha
Ani ratrici jevha ti palatate
Ani pratahkalaci, jevha to prakasamana vhava
Ki (nihsansaya ti jahannama) mothya gostimpaiki eka ahe
Manasala bhayabhita karanari
Tya manasankarita, je tumacyapaiki pudhe ja'u icchitila kinva mage hatu icchitila
Pratyeka manusya apalya karmancya aivaji gahana ahe
Parantu ujavya hatace
(Ki) te jannatimmadhye (basuna) vicarata asatila
Aparadhi lokanna
Tumhala jahannamamadhye konatya gostine takale
Te uttara detila ki amhi namaja padhanare navhato
Bhukelyanna jevu ghalata navhato
Ani amhi nirarthaka gosta (inkara) karanaryansobata nirarthaka gostita vyasta rahata hoto
Ani amhi mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavita hoto
Yetheparyanta ki amaca mrtyu ala
Tevha tyanna sipharasa karanaryanci sipharasa upayogi padanara nahi
Tyanna jhale tari kaya ki te upadesapasuna tonda phiravita aheta
Janu kahi bicakaleli gadhave hota
Je sinhapasuna palata asave
Kimbahuna tyancyapaiki pratyeka manusya icchito ki tyala spasta grantha dile javeta
Ase kadapi (ho'u sakata) nahi, kimbahuna he kayamatababata nirbhaya aheta
Kadapi nahi! Ha (kura'ana) eka upadesa ahe
Ata jo icchila, tyapasuna bodha grahana karila
Ani he tyaca veli bodha grahana karatila, jevha allaha icchila. To ya gostisa patra ahe ki tyace bhaya rakhave ani yasahi patra ki tyane mapha karave
Mi sapatha gheto kayamatacya divasaci
Ani mi sapatha gheto, dhihkkara karanarya mana (atmya) ci
Kaya manusya asa vicara karato ki amhi tyaci hade ekatra karanaraca nahita
Hoya avasya karu, amhala samarthya ahe ki tyacya botance eka eka pera thika karave
Parantu manusya tara icchito ki pudhe avajna ani avahelana karita rahave
Vicarato ki kayamataca divasa kevha ye'ila
Tara jevha dole jadavata hotila
Ani candra nisteja ho'ila
Ani surya va candra ekatra kele jatila
Tya divasi manusya mhanela ki aja paluna janyasa jaga kothe ahe
Nahi nahi, asraya ghenyace konatehi thikana nahi
Aja tara tujhya palanakartyakadeca (asrayace) thikana ahe
Aja manasala, tyane je kahi pudhe pathavile ani je kahi mage sodale, tyavisayi avagata karuna dile ja'ila
Kimbahuna manusya svatahca svatahvara pramana ahe
Maga to kitihi sababi sadara karita asala tari
(He paigambara!) Tumhi kura'anasa tvarita tondi patha karanyasathi apalya jibhela (gha'ine) halavu naka
Tyasa ekatra karane ani (tumacya tonduna) pathana karavine amaci jababadari ahe
(Yastava) amhi jevha tyace pathana sampavu tevha tumhi tyacya pathanace anusarana kara
Tyasa spasta karane amace kama ahe
Navhe, tumhi tara lavakara prapta honarya (jaga) si prema rakhata
Ani akhiratala soduna basala ahata
Tya divasi aneka cehare taje tavatavita (va tejasvi) asatila
Apalya palanakartyakade pahata asatila
Ani kityeka cehare tya divasi (kurupa ani) udasa asatila
Samajata asatila ki tyancyasi kambara todanara vyavahara kela ja'ila
Nahi nahi jevha (prana) kanthasi pohacatila
Ani sangitale ja'ila ki koni jhada phunka (tantra mantra) karanara ahe
Ani tyane khatri keli ki hi viyogaci vela ahe
Ani potarisi potari bilagela
Aja tujhya palanakartyakade jayace ahe
Tevha tyane na tara samarthana kele, na namaja ada keli
Ulata khote tharavile ani vimukha jhala
Maga apalya kutumbiyankade toryata gela
Kheda ahe tujhyabaddala! Pascattapa ahe tujhyavara
Punha duhkha ahe ani durdasa ahe tujhyasathi
Kaya manusya ase samajato ki tyala vyartha ase soduna dile ja'ila
Kaya to eka gadha panyaca themba navhata, jo tapakavila jato
Maga to raktaca gola banala, maga (allahane) tyala nirmana kele ani yogyaritya banavile
Maga tyapasuna jodi arthata nara-mada banavile
Kaya (allaha) ya gosti samartha nahi ki melelyasa jivanta karavam
Niscitaca manasavara kalaca eka samaya asahi ala ahe, jevha to kahica ullekha karanyayogya navhata
Nihsansaya, amhi manavala misra viryadvare kasotikarita nirmana kele, ani tyala aikanara pahanara banavile
Amhi tyala marga dakhavila maga to krtajna bano kinva krtaghna
Nihsansaya, amhi kaphira (inkari) lokankarita srnkhala ani jokhanda va dhagadhaganari aga tayara karuna thevali ahe
Nihsansaya, neka (sadacari) loka tya pyalyane pitila, jyata kapurace misrana ahe
Jo eka jhara ahe, jyatuna allahace dasa pitila, tyace pravaha (pata) kadhatila (jikade icchitila)
Je navasa purna karatata1 ani tya divasace bhaya balagatata, jyace sankata cari bajunna pasaranara ahe
Ani allahacya premakhatara gariba, anatha ani kaidyanna jevu ghalatata
Amhi tara tumhala kevala allahacya prasannatesathi jevu ghalato, tumacyakaduna na mobadala icchito, na abhara
Nihsansaya, amhi apalya palanakartyatarphe tya divasace bhaya rakhato jo motha duhsthitica ani kathoratapurna asela
Tevha allahane tyanna tya divasacya sankatapasuna vacavile. Ani tyanna tajelata va ananda pradana kela
Ani tyanna tyancya dhira - sanyamacya mobadalyata jannata ani resami vastra pradana kele
Te tithe asananvara takke lavuna basatila, tyanna tithe na suryaci prakhara usnata janavela, na sakta thandici tivrata
Ani tyancya (jannatacya) savalya tyancyavara jhukalelya asatila ani tyance (meve) ani gucche khali lombakalata asatila
Ani tyancya daramyana candici bhandi ani kacece pyale ye - ja karatila
Kacahi candici asela, jyanna (pinaryanni) anumanane mapuna thevale asela
Ani tyanna tithe asi peye pajali jatila, jyata sunthice misrana asela
Jannatacya eka pravahatuna jyace nava salasabila ahe
Ani tyancya cohikade ti alpavayina balake hindata-phirata asatila. Je nehami (balaka) rahanare aheta. Jevha tumhi tyanna pahala tara kalpana karala ki te (janu) vikhuralele (as'sala) moti aheta
Ani tumhi tithe, jikade pahala tikade purna isadenagya ani mahana rajyasatta disuna ye'ila
Tyancya (sarira) vara hirave maulyavana ani jada resami vastre asatila. Ani tyanna candicya kankanaca dagina ghatala ja'ila ani tyanna tyanca palanakarta svaccha sud'dha (paka) madya pajela
(Pharmavile ja'ila) ha ahe tumacya karmanca mobadala ani tumacya prayatnanci prasansa keli geli
Nihsansaya, amhi tumacyavara kura'ana halu halu (kramakramane) avatarita kele
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya adesavara atala raha, ani tyancyapaiki konatyahi aparadhyace kinva krtaghnace mhanane man'ya karu naka
Ani sakala sandhyakala apalya palanakartyace namahsmarana kara
Ani ratricya veli tyacya samora sajade kara ani ratricya dirgha bhagaparyarnta tyace pavitryasaha gunagana kara
Nihsansaya, he loka lavakara prapta honarya jagaci iccha dharatata, ani apalya mage eka mothya bharadasta divasala soduna detata
Amhi tyanna nirmana kele ani amhica tyance joda (sandhe) majabuta kele ani amhi vatela tevha tyancya badalyata tyancyasarakhe dusaryanna badaluna anu
Nihsansaya, ha tara eka upadesa ahe. Tevha jo icchila tyane apalya palanakartyaca marga prapta karava
Ani tumhi iccha na karala parantu he ki allahaca icchila. Nihsansaya, allaha jananara ani hikamata balaganara ahe
Jyala icchila, apalya krpeta samila karuna ghe'ila ani aparadhi (atyacarim) karita tyane duhkhadayaka azaba tayara karuna thevala ahe
Manamohaka, satata calanarya manda haveci sapatha
Maga jorata (vegane) vahu laganarinci sapatha
Ani (dhaganna) pasaravinarinci sapatha
Maga satya - asatyala vegavegale karanare
Ani vahayi (prakasana) ananarya pharistyanci sapatha
Ji (vahayi) aropace khandana karanyasathi kinva saceta karanyasathi asate
Nihsansaya, jya gostica tumacyasi vayada kela jata ahe ti agadi niscitapane ghaduna yenara ahe
Tara jevha tare nisteja kele jatila
Ani akasaca vidhvansa kela ja'ila
Ani jevha parvata tukade tukade karuna udavile jatila
Ani jevha paigambaranna nirdharita velevara anale ja'ila
Konatya divasakarita (tyanna) thambavile gele ahe
Nirnayacya divasakarita
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki nirnayaca divasa kaya ahe
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi duhsthiti (vinasa) ahe
Kaya amhi purvi ho'una gelelya lokanna nasta nahi kele
Maga amhi tyancya pathopatha nantaracya lokanna anale
Amhi aparadhi lokansi asaca vyavahara karato
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryankarita vinasa ahe
Kaya amhi tumhala tuccha panya (virya) pasuna nirmana kele nahi
Maga amhi tyasa majabuta (ani suraksita) sthani thevale
Eka nirdharita vele paryarnta
Maga amhi anumana lavale, tara amhi kiti cangale anumana lavanare ahota
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Kaya amhi jaminila sancayita karanari nahi banavile
Jivanta asalelyannahi ani melelyannahi
Ani amhi ticyata unca (ani vajanadara) parvata banavile, ani tumhala sincita karanare goda pani pajale
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Tya (jahannama) kade ja, jila tumhi khote tharavita hote
Cala tya savalikade, jila tina sakha aheta
Ji vastavika na chaya denari ahe ani na jvalapasuna vacavu sakate
Nihsansaya, (jahannama) mahalasarakhya cingarya phekate
Janu kahi te pivale unta aheta
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi durdasa (vinasa) ahe
Aja (ca divasa) asa divasa ahe ki te boluhi sakanara nahita
Na tyanna sababa mandanyaci anumati dili ja'ila
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryanci duhsthiti (kharabi) ahe
Ha ahe phaisalyaca divasa. Amhi tumhala ani purvi ho'una gelelya lokanna (sarvanna) ekatrita kele ahe
Tevha jara tumhi majhyasi ekhadi cala khelu sakata asala tara kheluna paha
Duhkha ahe tya divasi khote tharavinaryankarita
Nihsansaya, neka sadacari loka savalita asatila ani vahatya jharyammadhye
Ani tya phalammadhye, jyanci te iccha karatila
(He jannatamadhye rahanaryanno!) Majeta kha ani pya, apalya krta-karmancya mobadalyata
Nihsansaya, amhi satkarma (neki) karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryankarita mothe duhkha ahe
(He khote tharavinaryanno!) Tumhi (ya jagata) thode kha'una pi'una ghya ani labha prapta karuna ghya. Niscitaca tumhi aparadhi ahata
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Tyanna jevha sangitale jate ki ruku'a kara (jhuka) tara karita nahi
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryanca vinasa ahe
Ata ya (kura'ana) nantara konatya gostivara imana rakhatila
He loka konatya gostici vicarapusa karita aheta
Tya mothya khabarici
Jyababata he aneka mata (vicara) rakhatata
Niscitapane he ataca januna ghetila
Punha niscitapane tyanna phara lavakara mahita padela
Kaya amhi jaminila bicha'ita nahi banavile
Ani parvatanna mekha nahi banavile
Ani amhi tumhala jodi jodine nirmana kele
Ani amhi tumacya jhopela tumacya aramace karana banavile
Ani ratrila amhi padada (avarana) banavile
Ani divasala amhi roji prapta karanyaca samaya banavile
Ani tumacya varati amhi sata majabuta akasa banavile
Ani eka cakakanara tejasvi dipa nirmana kela
Ani dhagandvare amhi musaladhara parjan'yavrsti keli

Ani jevha to (allaha) yaci kasoti gheto, tyaci ajivika tanga (kami) karuna takato, tevha to mhanu lagato ki majhya palanakartyane majhi avhelana keli (ani mala apamanita kele)
Ase mulica nahi kimbahuna (khari gosta asi) ki tumhi loka anathaca mana-sanmana rakhata nahi
Ani garibanna jevu ghalanyace ekamekanna protsahana deta nahi
Ani (melelyanci) varasa sampatti gola karuna khatata
Ani dhana-sampattisi jivanapada prema rakhata
Nihsansaya, jaminila jevha kuthuna kuthuna tila agadi sapata kele ja'ila
Ani tumaca palanakarta (svatah) prakata ho'ila ani phariste ranga bandhuna (yetila)
Ani jya divasi jahannamalahi anale ja'ila tya divasi manusa bodha grahana karila. Parantu ata tyacya bodha grahana karanyaca kaya labha
To mhanela ki mi apalya ya jivanakarita kahi satkarme, pahilyapasuna karuna thevali asati tara phara bare jhale asate
Tara aja allahacya siksa - yatanesarakhi siksa - yatana an'ya konacihi nasela
Na tyacya bandhanasarakhe konace bandhana asela
He santusta atma
Tu apalya palanakartyakade parata cala, asa avastheta ki tu tyacyasi raji, to tujhyasi prasanna
Tevha, majhya khasa dasammadhye samila ho
Ani majhya jannatamadhye pravesa kara
Mi ya saharaci sapatha gheto
Ani tumhi ya saharata vastavya karata
Ani (sapatha ahe) manavi pita ani santatici
Nihsansaya, amhi manavala (mothya) kasta-yataneta nirmana kele

Kaya, to (ase) samajato ki koni tyala pahileca nahi
Kaya, amhi tyace dona dole nahi banavile
Ani eka jibha va dona otha (nahi banavile)

Maga tya lokampaiki jhala asata, je imana rakhatata, ani ekamekanna dhira sanyama va daya karuna karanyaci takida karatata
Heca loka aheta ujavya bajuce

Sapatha ahe suryaci ani tyacya unhaci

Jyane ya (atmya) la svaccha sud'dha kele, to saphala jhala

Tya lokanni apalya paigambaranna khote januna tya sandanila maruna takale. Tevha tyancya palanakartyane tyancya aparadhapayi tyanna vinasata takale ani maga vinasala sarvatrika kele ani tya sampurna vastila bhu'isapata karuna takale
To ya prakopacya parinamapasuna nirbhaya ahe
Sapatha ahe ratrici jevha ti pasarate
Ani sapatha ahe divasaci jevha to prakasamana hoto
Ani sapatha ahe tyaci jyane nara va madi nirmana kele

Tara jo (allahacya margata) deta rahila ani bhaya balagata rahila
Ani bhala'ipurna gostice satya-samarthana karita rahila

Parantu jyane kanjusi keli ani beparva'i dakhavili

Tyaci dhana-sampatti tyala (tondaghasi) padateveli kahica upayogi padanara nahi
Nihsansaya, marga dakhavinyaci jababadari amaci ahe
Ani amacyaca hati akhirata ani hi duniya ahe

Jicyata phakta toca kamanasibi dakhala ho'ila

Nihsansaya, to (allaha dekhila) lavakaraca raji ho'ila

Tumhala tumaca palanakarta phara lavakaraca (inama) de'ila ani tumhi raji (va khusa) vhala
Kaya tyane tumhala anatha januna asraya dila nahi
Ani tumhala, marga visaralele pahuna marga dakhavila nahi
Ani tumhala nirdhana asalele pahuna srimanta banavile nahi
Tevha anathavara tumhihi sakti (kathorata) karu naka
Ani na yacana karanaryala datuna daradavuna bolu naka
Ani apalya palanakartyacya krpa-denagyance varnana karita raha
Kaya amhi tumaci chati (hrdaya) ughada keli nahi
Ani tumacyavaruna tumace ojhe utaravile
Jyane tumaci patha moduna takali hoti
Ani amhi tumaci carca bulanda keli
Tevha niscitaca kathinatesaha sahajata ahe
Nihsansaya, kathinatesaha sahajata ahe
Tara, jevha tumhi kamakaja atopuna mokale vhala, tara tevha (upasaneta) magna vha
Ani apalya palanakartyakade mana lava
Sapatha ahe anjiraci ani jaitunaci
Ani sanayicya tura (parvata) ci
Ani ya santipurna saharaci
Nihsansaya, amhi manavala ati uttama svarupata nirmana kele
Maga tyala khalacya starampeksa khalacya staraca karuna takale
Parantu jya lokanni imana rakhale ani maga satkarma karita rahile tara tyancyasathi asa cangala mobadala ahe jokadhi sampanara nahi
Maga tumhala ata, mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavinyasa konati gosta pravrtta karate
Kaya sarvasrestha allaha (sarva) sasakanca sasaka nahi
Pathana kara apalya palanakartyacya navane, jyane nirmana kele
Jyane manavala raktacya lothadya (golya) pasuna nirmana kele
Tumhi pathana karita raha tumaca palanakarta motha krpasila ahe
Jyane lekhanidvare (jnana) sikavile
Jyane manasala te sikavile, je to janata navhata
Kharokhara manusya tara svatahvara kabu thevata nahi
Asasathi ki to svatahla niscinta (kinva srimanta) samajato
Nihsansaya, tumacya palanakartyakadeca parata jayace ahe
(Bare) tyalahi tumhi pahile, jo (eka dasala) rokhato
Vastivaka to dasa namaja ada karato
Ata tumhica sanga jara to sanmargavara asela
Kinva allahace bhaya rakhuna vaganyaca adesa deta asela

Asa matha jo khota va gunhegara ahe
Tyane apalya baithakitalya lokanna bolavuna ghyave
Amhihi jahannamacya raksakanna bolavuna ghe'u
Khabaradara! Tyace mhanane mulica man'ya karu naka ani sajada kara va (allahasi) nikata vha
Nihsansaya, amhi ya (kura'ana) la kadra (barakati) cya ratri avatarita kele
Tumhala kaya mahita ki kadraci ratra kaya ahe
Kadraci ratra eka hajara mahin'yampeksa uttama ahe
Ya ratri (pratyeka karya para padanyasa) apalya palanakartyacya adesane phariste ani ruha (jibrila) avatarita hotata
Hi ratra purnapane salamatici asate ani pratahkalaca udaya (pahata) ho'iparyanta asate
Granthadharakampaiki inkara karanare ani anekesvaravadi loka apalya vartanapasuna mage hatanare navhate, joparyanta tyancyajavala ughada pramana na yave (ani te pramana he hote ki)
Sarvasrestha allahaca eka paigambara, jo pavitra grantha vacuna dakhavila
Jyata ucita va spasta isa'adesa asaveta
Granthadharaka apalyajavala spasta pramana ye'una pohacalyanantaraca (matabhedata paduna) vibhajita jhale

Vastavika tyanna yakherija konatahi adesa dila gela nahi ki tyanni phakta allahacica upasana karavi, tyacyacakarita dina (dharma) la visud'dha rakhave. (Ibrahima) haniphacya dina (dharma) vara ani namajala kayama rakhave ani jakata (kartavya-dana) deta rahave. Haca sarala dina (dharma) ahe muslima sampradayaca
Nihsansaya, je loka granthadharakampaiki inkari jhale. Ani anekesvaravadi, sarvacya sarva jahannamacya agita (jatila), jyata te nehami (nehami) rahatila. Heca loka sarvanta va'ita nirmiti hoya
Nihsansaya, jya lokanni imana rakhale ani satkarma kele, tara ase loka (allahaci) sarvanta uttama nirmiti hoya

Yanca mobadala, tyancya palanakartyajavala nirantara rahanarya jannati aheta, jyancya khali (thanda panyace) pravaha vahata asatila, jyata te sadaivakala rahatila. Sarvasrestha allaha tyancyasi raji jhala, ani he tyacyasi raji jhale. He (kevala asa manasakarita ahe jo apalya palanakartyace bhaya rakhato)
Jevha jaminila purnapane tharathara halavile ja'ila
Ani ti apalyata asalele sarva ojhe bahera kadhuna phekela
Manusya mhanu lagela ki hila jhale tari kaya
Tya divasi jamina apala sarva ahavala sadara karila
Yasathi ki tumacya palanakartyane tila tasa adesa dila asela
Tya divasi loka vegavegalya jamati banuna (parata) phiratila yasathi ki tyanna tyanci karme dakhavili javita
Tevha, jyane kana'itakehi satkarma kele asela, to te pahila
Ani jyane kana'itakehi duskarma kele asela, to te pahila
Dhapa takita dhavanarya ghodyanci sapatha
Maga tapa maruna cingarya udavinaryanci sapatha
Maga sakalacya veli halla cadhavinaryanci sapatha
Tara tya veli dhula udavitata
Maga tyacasobata sain'yammadhye ghusatata
Nihsansaya, manusya apalya palanakartyasi motha krtaghna ahe
Ani khatrine to svatahhi yavara saksi ahe
Ani ha dhanacya mohatahi motha sakta (kathora) ahe
Kaya yala ti vela mahita nahi jevha kabarimadhye je (kahi) ahe, kadhuna ghetale ja'ila
Ani manatalya gupta gostinna ughada kele ja'ila
Nihsansaya, yanca palanakarta tya divasi yancya avastheci purepura khabara rakhanara asela
Khadakhadavinari
Kaya ahe ti khadakhadavinari
Tumhala kaya mahita ki ti khadakhadavinari kaya ahe
Jya divasi manase itastatah vikhuralelya kitaka patangampramane hotila
Ani parvata, pinjalelya rangita lokarisarakhe hotila
Maga jyace parade vajanata bhari asela
Tara to aisa-aramacya jivanata asela
Ani jyace parade vajanata halake asela
Tara tyace thikana ‘haviya’ ahe
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki ti kaya ahe
Ti khupa prakharatene bhadakata asaleli aga ahe
Jastita jasta milavinyacya mohane tumhala gaphila karuna takale
Yetheparyarnta ki tumhi kabrastanata ja'una pohocale (daphana jhale)
Mulica nahi, tumhi lavakaraca januna ghyala
Mulica nahi, tumhala phara lavakara kaluna ye'ila
Mulica nahi, jara tumhi khatrisirapane januna ghyala
Tara niscitaca tumhi jahannama jarura pahala
Ani tumhi tila visvasacya dolyanni pahala
Maga tya divasi tumhala niscitapane krpa denagyambabata vicarale ja'ila
Kalaci sapatha
Vastuta sare manava purnatah ghatyata aheta
Matra tya lokankherija, jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarma karita rahile ani (jyanni) apasata satyavara kayama rahanyaci takida keli ani ekamekanna dhira sanyama rakhanyaca upadesa kela
Mothi va'ita avastha ahe asa tya pratyeka manasaci jo vyanga dosa sodhanara, cahadi karanara asela
Jo dhana - daulata ekatra karato ani mojuna thevato
To ase samajato ki tyaci dhana - daulata tyancyajavala sada sarvakala rahila
Mulica nahi. Ha tara curada karuna takanarya agita phekala ja'ila
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki asi aga kaya asela
Ti allahane petavileli aga asela
Ji hrdayanvara cadhataca ja'ila
(Ti aga) sagalikaduna bandista asela
Ani tyancyavara mothamothya khambammadhye
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki tumacya palanakartyane hattivalyansi kasa vyavahara kela
Kaya tyanca dava asaphala nahi kela
Ani tyancyavara paksyancya jhundivara jhundi pathavilya
Je tyancyavara mati ani dagadancya khadyanca mara karita hote
Maga tyanna kha'una takalelya bhusa (cothya) pramane karuna takale
Kuraisala asakti milavuna denyakarita
(Arthata) tyanna sardi va garamicya pravasaci savaya lavuna denyakarita
Tyanni (krtajnata mhanuna) ya gharacya (kabagrhacya) svamici upasana karita rahile pahije
Jyane tyanna bhukelya avastheta khayala dile ani bhaya-dahasaticya avastheta santi (suraksa) pradana keli
Kaya tumhi (tyalahi) pahile jo mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavito
Haca to hoya, jo anathala dhakke marato
Ani garibala jevu ghalanyasa protsahana deta nahi
Tya namaji lokankarita ‘vaila’ (namaka jahannamaci eka jaga) ahe
Je apalya namajampasuna gaphila aheta
Je kevala dekhava dakhavitata
Ani vaparanyaci vastu rokhuna dharatata
Nihsansaya, amhi tumhala kausara (ani bareca kahi) pradana kele ahe
Tevha, tumhi apalya palanakartyasathi namaja padha ani kurbani kara
Nihsansaya, tumaca satruca bevarasi ani nava-nisana nasalela ahe
Tumhi sanguna taka ki he inkari lokanno
Na mi upasana karato tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Na tumhi upasana karanare ahata tyaci, jyaci mi upasana karato

Ani na tumhi tyaci upasana karala, jyaci mi upasana karato
Tumacyasathi tumaca dina (dharma) ahe ani majhyasathi majha dina (dharma) ahe
Jevha allahatarphe madata ani vijaya prapta ho'ila

Tevha apalya palanakartyaci stuti prasansesaha pavitrata varnana karu laga ani tyacyajavala ksama yacaneci prarthana karita raha. Nihsansaya, to motha tauba (ksama-yacana) kabula karanara ahe
Abu lahabace donhi hata tutale ani to (svatah) nasta jhala
Na tara tyaci sampatti tyacya kami ali ani na tyaci kama'i

Tumhi sanga ki mi pratahkalacya svamicya saranata yeto

Tumhi sanga, mi lokancya palanakartyacya saranata yeto

Lokancya upasya (allaha) cya (asrayata)
(Manata) kuvicara takanarya, mage hatanaryacya upadravapasuna
Jo lokancya manata va'ita vicara takato
(Maga to) jinnampaiki aso kinva manasampaiki
